name: Axioma&Co.
description: Axioma & Co. is a digital communication agency based in Barcelona with more than 13 years of experience. Their team is made up of 15 professionals who specialize in tracing strategies in social media to position the brand within the 2.0 panorama and bring it closer to its consumers. They like to build projects from start to finish. They are present in each of the phases of our work: they create and trace the strategy, design and program each project.
